task_summary: Robot must avoid obstacle and reach the scissors placed on the table, using visual feedback and robust navigation.

task_long_description.overview: This episode depicts a tabletop workspace with a robot arm required to reach a pair of scissors located near books and a small box. The robot must visually identify the scissors, plan its approach avoiding obstacles (such as books and a spherical object), and move its end-effector towards the target. The scene is structured around robust goal-directed movements while reacting to any occlusions or failed detections.
preconditions: Robot system powered on and calibrated
Work area contains scissors, obstacles present (books, sphere)
Scissors are visible or can be detected via scanning
No obstructions block arm movement completely
stepwise_plan: Scan the scene if scissors are not visible
Plan and execute a safe path to scissors, avoiding obstacles
success_criteria: End-effector reaches the scissors' position without contacting obstacles
Scissors visually confirmed at end of movement
failure_and_recovery: Failure to detect scissors (retry scan up to 3 attempts)
Impeded movement from obstacles (movement plan adapts, retries allowed)
Timeout on action triggers regroup or abort
task_long_description.termination: Task terminates when the scissors are reached or retries/timeouts are exhausted

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the scissors

node_specs.description: Checks if the scissors are currently visible in the scene.
Performs a grid-like scan, up to 3 times, to locate the scissors.
Detects the scissors using perception within allotted timeout.
Moves the robot end-effector to the scissors' position, avoiding obstacles.

failure_modes: Scissors not visible due to occlusion
recovery_strategy: Retry scanning up to allowed attempts
Re-plan movement trajectory if obstruction sensed
assumptions: Instruction mentions 'avoid obstacle', but no explicit collision sensing nodes are available; obstacle avoidance is implicit in MoveTo
Scissors are visually identifiable and reachable
Frames indicate end-effector path and gradual advance toward scissors

expected_success_criteria: Arm reaches scissors without colliding with other objects
